description:
Top puzzle game & family game in US, France, and many other countries.

Mr. Wiener is a simple yet addictive puzzle game. You’re hungry, you want a wiener, and it’s stuck behind the other food items in the fridge. Slide the other food items out of the way to get your wiener. Try your wiener retrieval skills with over 400 different configurations. 

Features of the game:

* Superb high quality graphics & cute characters!
* Hours of fun!
* Try the first 50 puzzles for free
* Over 400 unique puzzles in all
* Nice music and sound effects
